targets.query: SELECT count("source_ip") FROM "default"."http_requests" WHERE ("host"::tag =~ /^$Request_Target$/) AND $timeFilter Group By "host"::tag

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "http_requests" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Request Target
list.name: request_target
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "http_requests" WITH KEY = "host"
